scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.build: cd server && npm install && npx prisma generate && npm run build
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm install && npx prisma generate && npm run build
scripts.start: cd server && npx prisma migrate deploy && node dist/index.js
scripts.start:server: cd server && npx prisma migrate deploy && node dist/index.js
scripts.postinstall: cd server && npm install && npx prisma generate
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=server && npm run lint --workspace=client
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=server && npm run test --workspace=client
